nodes.text: Havor was a male smuggler. In 30 BBY, he and his copilot Merglyn were killed above Kiffex by the Kiffu Guardians, due to a faulty shield generator sold to them by Watto, while attempting to smuggle blasters to that planet. Unbeknownst to Havor, Jedi Knight Aayla Secura had stowed away in the cargo hold in order to pursue Volfe Karkko.
